fields_of_interest: Education and training, Environment, Food Safety
eu_initiatives:
Environmental policies, chemical policies, labelling and classification, biocidal products, Nano materials, sustainability. 
Packaging regulations, food contact regulations.
organisation_name: European Council of the Paint, Printing Ink and Artists' Colours Industry (CEPE)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Technical expert group for food contact materials#E03354#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3354#Member#C#Standing Committee on Precursors#E03245#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3245#Observer#C#Competent Authorities for Biocidal Products (Regulation (EU) No 528/2012)#E03125#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3125#Observer#C#Expert Group on the exchange of information on Best Available Techniques related to industrial emissions (IED Article 13 Forum)#E02611#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2611#Member#C
relevant_communication:
Collecting industry opinions, participating in stakeholders consultations, organizing Forum and Conferences concerning the above topics. 
Product Environmental Foodprint project.
goals__remit: CEPE is a non-profit-making organisation.  Its objective is to study scientific and technical data concerning the European paint, printing inks and artists’ colours industries and to circulate information and surveys of a scientific and technical nature in order to promote the image of the industry, to keep the members up-to-date and to protect their common interests.
